plptool

Class Msg

  • java.lang.Object
    • plptool.Msg

  • public class Msg
extends java.lang.Object
    PLPTool messaging utility class.

        public static void setOutput(javax.swing.JTextPane newOutput)

      • E

        public static int E(java.lang.String errStr,
                    int errorCode,
                    java.lang.Object objIdentifier)
        This function either prints out an error message to stderr or the specified JTextArea in the output pointer. Error numbers equal or greater to 1024 will always be printed to stderr.
        Parameters:
        errStr - Error string to print.
        errorCode - Error code.
        objIdentifier - A reference to the offending object.
        Returns:
        The error code for further handling.

      • W

        public static void W(java.lang.String warningStr,
                     java.lang.Object objIdentifier)
        This function either prints out an warning message to stdout or the specified JTextArea in the output pointer.
        Parameters:
        warningStr - Error string to print.
        objIdentifier - A reference to the offending object.

        objIdentifier - The object invoking this call.
